Aquila::Exception

Public Member Functions

 Exception (const std::string &what)
 Creates an exception object.

Detailed Description

Base exception class of the library.

Class clients should rather catch exceptions of specific types, such as Aquila::FormatException, however it is allowed to catch Aquila::Exception as the last resort (but catch(...)).
